calculatePrizesAndFee(uint256[]).details: Calculates the total prize amount and platform fee

returns.platformFee: The fee collected by the platform

cancelBounty(uint256).details: Allows the creator to cancel a bounty

params._bountyType: Type of the bounty (editable or non-editable)
params._prizes: Array of individual prize amounts for each winner
params._totalWinners: Total number of winners to be selected

createSubmission(uint256,string).details: Allows a participant to submit their work for a bounty

params._bountyId: The ID of the bounty to edit
params._cid: The new CID of the bounty
params._prizes: Array of individual prize amounts for each winner
params._resultDeadline: The new deadline for announcing results
params._totalWinners: Total number of winners to be selected

editSubmision(uint256,string,uint256).details: Allows a participant to edit their submission

params._cid: The new CID of the submission
params._submissionIndex: The index of the submission in the array

getBounty(uint256).details: Returns the list of bounties created by a user

getBountySubmissions(uint256).details: Returns the list of submissions for a bounty

returns._0: The list of submissions for the bounty

getUserBounties(address).details: Returns the list of bounties created by a user

returns._0: The list of bounty IDs created by the user

isParticipantOfBounty(uint256,address).details: Returns the list of submissions for a bounty

returns._0: True if the address is a participant, false otherwise

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

selectWinners(uint256,address[]).details: Allows the creator to select winners for the bounty and distribute prizes

params._winners: Array of addresses of the selected winners

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

withdraw(uint256).details: Allows the owner to withdraw collected fees
